tool_description: CO2 Footprint of current electricity in Germany.
name: Electricity Carbon Footprint Germany
title: Electricity Carbon Footprint Germany

api_list.name: CO2 Emission
api_list.description: The CO2 Emission endpoint will provide carbon emissions in grams per Kilo-Watt-Hour.  To latest and historical footprint information for electricity in Germany.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
Allows retrieving historical values (back to yr 2017) .

Accepted formats:

- YYYY-MM-DD
- MM/DD/YYYY
- Unix Timestamp (ms)
